name: Arena of Legends (Neffesh)
description:
DISCLAIMER! This game is mainly made for learning and portfolio purposes . This game has no plans to receive any further updates, all feedback is appreciated and will be used for my future projects, thanks! 

Arena of Legends is a Free-to-Play fast 3vs3 team based fighting arena game with 3 different kind of characters available.

Dragoon is a versatile character with a fireball and an area of effect attack which slows the enemies while dealing damage over time. Dragoon also has a great mobility with a dash.

Pixiepy is a support kind of character with a strong heal and a stun. To defend itself Pixiepy also has a mortal beam that deals a lot of damage.

Snaku is a tricky character that can become invisible and gain movement speed. Snaku has lethal potential with its poison combined with the spit, which can stun if the opponent is poisoned.
